name: Crossroads: What Was Lost Collector's Edition
name_original: Crossroads: What Was Lost Collector's Edition
description:
Elephant Games returns with your favorite cosmic counselor turned bartender in Crossroads: What Was Lost!

WARNING: This horror game features moments of psychological terror that some may find distressing. It is not for the faint of heart.

When Eden struggles to find direction after a devastating loss, Crossroads and bartender Mistress Eve appear just in the nick of time! Eden's love of fairy tales and legends makes these three spine-tingling fables the perfect way to set them on the right path. But be careful! At Crossroads, every choice counts, not only for you but for every character you encounter! So, will you take Mistress Eve's lessons to heart, or will these tales take a more tragic turn? Find out in this eerily suspenseful Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!

This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene, and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.

This Collector's Edition release is full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version!

The Collector’s Edition includes:

• Continue your adventures with Mistress Eve in the Bonus Chapter!
• Explore Bonus Content to revisit HOPs and mini-games!
• Scour locations to find puzzle pieces and collectibles!
• Enjoy exclusive music, wallpapers, and more!
• Never get lost with the strategy guide!
